item.title: Refactored dotfiles
item.description: Finally, I managed to update my dotfiles today and change for chezmoi for managing them properly. It took a bit of time, but I’m pleased with the result now. If you are interested, you can find them here.

item.title: My first post
item.description: I guess my first post should be something funny so here is one pic of my sleeping dogs. I hope my next post will be something more useful though :)
